overview: Recorded live at San Bernadino's Orange Pavillion on May 19th, 1984. Presented by KMET & MTV.  1. The Kids Are Back 2. We're Not Gonna Take It (Music Video) 3. I Wanna Rock 4. Under The Blade  5. The Beast  6. You Can't Stop Rock 'N' Roll (Music Video) 7. The Price 8. Stay Hungry 9. Burn In Hell 10. S.M.F.
tagline: Recorded live at San Bernadino's Orange Pavillion on May 19th, 1984. Presented by KMET & MTV.
title: Twisted Sister - Stay Hungry Live
